name: Engineering Team Weekly Update - Week 12
content:
Engineering Team Weekly Update

Team Highlights:

  • Backend team completed API v2 migration

  • Frontend team launched new dashboard

  • DevOps automated deployment pipeline

Key Metrics:

  1. Performance

    • API response time: 120ms (↓15%)

    • Frontend load time: 1.8s (↓20%)

  2. Quality

    • Test coverage: 87% (+2%)

    • Bug backlog: 12 (↓5)

Upcoming Focus:

  • Launch mobile app beta

  • Complete security audit

  • Start ML pipeline integration

Team Updates:

  • Welcome new hire: Sarah (Frontend)

  • Mike promoted to Senior Engineer

  • Team lunch on Friday

Blockers/Support Needed:

  • Cloud cost optimization review

  • Additional QA resources needed
